author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 51,091 students will write the State Board plus two public examinations beginning on March 4 and 53,548 students will appear for the class X examinations which will begin on March 15. In a preparatory meeting on Wednesday, Chennai District Collector K. Govindaraj, asked representatives from government departments to ensure that students could easily reach their exam venues. He also called for putting in place adequate security measures at those centres where question papers had been assembled. Flying squads will be formed under the Chief Education Officer, the Collector said.

While the plus two examinations will end on April 1, class X examinations will end on April 13, the release added.
title: Preparations begin for public examinations
